long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mostly aimed for users who want to make their life easier using some JavaScript snippets in one extension!
- Mods for games such as Cookie Clicker and TheUselessWeb (more to come!)
- Automation scripts for some websites
- Tools like Discord Webhook message creator, Image grabber and CPS test
- Fun stuff like Confetti and rainbow text
